main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Utica, New York on 19th May 1952 at 3:10 AM by a civilian witness. The sighting involved one unidentified aerial object observed for a duration of 30 seconds with an eastward course.
interesting points: The witness described the UFO sighting as a fiery and luminous phenomenon, which aligns with traditional descriptions of UFOs.
The report mentioned the UFO exhibiting erratic flight patterns, hovering stationary, and emitting beams, rays, and halos.
There was a detailed description of the specific behavior of the UFO, including aspects such as its acceleration, deceleration, and abrupt changes in direction.
This incident involved a credible witness, a civilian, which adds weight to the authenticity of the report.
Despite the observation length of 30 seconds, no photographs or physical evidence of the UFO were obtained.
